title: The Bachelorette's Tony Strugar welcomes a child with wife Valerie
text:
He found love soon after being rejected by Sam Frost on the first season of The Bachelorette Australia.

And Tony Strugar announced on Tuesday that he and his wife, Valerie, have welcomed their first child together, a daughter named Avery Strugar.

Valerie gave birth on Sunday but the couple, who married on the Sunshine Coast last year, waited two days to publicly share the news.

Congratulations! The Bachelorette's Tony Strugar and his wife, Valerie, have welcomed their first child together, a daughter named Avery Strugar. Pictured: Valerie and the newborn

Taking to Instagram, Tony posted several precious photos of baby Avery swaddled in blankets and falling asleep in Valerie's arms.

He wrote in the caption: 'Welcome, Avery Strugar 27/10/19.'

While Avery is Tony's first child, Valerie appears to have a four-year-old daughter named Blue from a previous relationship.

Proud father: Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, Tony shared several precious photos of baby Avery swaddled in blankets

Family of four: While Avery is Tony's first child, Valerie appears to have a four-year-old daughter named Blue (centre) from a previous relationship

Happily ever after: Tony married Valerie, who is an airline cabin manager, in a romantic seaside ceremony on the Sunshine Coast last year

Tony married Valerie, who is an airline cabin manager, in a romantic seaside ceremony on the Sunshine Coast last year.

He rose to fame in 2015 as a contestant on the first season of The Bachelorette, starring Sam Frost.

The businessman previously told The Morning Bulletin that Valerie had been living in Italy for five years before they met and so 'didn't know' he'd appeared on reality TV.

Don't you know who I am? The businessman previously said that Valerie had been living in Italy for five years before they met and so 'didn't know' he'd appeared on The Bachelorette

Blast from the past: Tony (left) rose to fame in 2015 as a contestant on the first season of The Bachelorette, starring Sam Frost (right)

Pictured: Tony (front row, third from left) with Sam (centre) and the cast of The Bachelorette

Tony is perhaps best remembered for his painfully awkward date with Sam and fellow Bachelorette contestant Davey Lloyd.

The trio had participated in a casino-themed two-on-one date before watching fireworks over Sydney Harbour.

At the time, fans described it on Twitter as one of the most uncomfortable moments in the franchise's history.

Cringeworthy: Tony is perhaps best remembered for his painfully awkward date with Sam (left) and fellow Bachelorette contestant Davey Lloyd (centre)
description: He found love soon after being rejected by Sam Frost on the first season of The Bachelorette Australia.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
